title: Iranian Nobel Laureate Gets Second Prison Sentence and Ends Hunger Strike
summary_full: The activist Narges Mohammadi was sentenced to another seven years, bringing the total she must serve to 17 years, her foundation said.
summary_public: The activist Narges Mohammadi was sentenced to another seven years, bringing the total she must serve to 17 years, her foundation said.
